title: Macworld Podcast: Close looks at the new Apple TV 4K and 24-inch iMac
content:
The new Apple TV 4K and 24-inch iMac have arrived in the Macworld offices. We talk about our impressions about the new products, what we like and not like, in this episode of the Macworld Podcast.

This is episode 744 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.

Get info

Learn more about the products we talk about on the show.

  • Apple TV 4K review: A slightly better box with a greatly improved remote
  • Hands-on with the 24-inch iMac: Simply gorgeous, inside and out (of the box)
  • Got a new 24-inch iMac? Do these 5 things first
  • 24-inch M1 iMac: Spend a little extra to get a lot more
